name: Web Development
description: From frontend to backend, testing to production, blog to E-commerce, we got you covered.

points.title: Languages: Node.js, PHP, Python
points.subtitle: Different projects have different requirements. Our team works on and keeps up to date with various languages like Node.js, PHP, Python, Go and more.

points.title: Vue, React, Angular or custom framework
points.subtitle: We are experts at every major backend and frontend framework there is. Including Vue, React, Svelte, Nuxt, Next, Angular, Bootstrap, Tailwind, jQuery and more.

points.title: Databases: MySql, MongoDB, Firebase
points.subtitle: Every growing startup needs a strong and scalable database. That's why we offer development and migration services for every major database.

points.title: 100% SEO score.
points.subtitle: We believe our customers deserve the best. That's why our smallest of plans provide on page optimization and SEO by default.

name: App Development
description: From startup to E-commerce, we got you covered. We develop Android and iOS apps at affordable price.

points.title: Android & iOS supported
points.subtitle: With the smartphones leading the internet. It's time to build your business by targeting the most active and huge part of internet users.

points.title: Scalable backend
points.subtitle: Ten Thousand users? Million users? Ten million? Doesn't matter. Stay prepared for the incoming customer boost with our scalable backend and database.

points.title: Get your app running in no time.
points.subtitle: The lowest planning to deployment time in market. Get you app running and start acquiring customers in no time.

points.title: Free maintainence for 4 weeks.
points.subtitle: That's right. We provide free maintainence for weeks even after the project is complete. Which can be extended on demand.

name: Digital Merketing
description: A great product requires great marketing. We handle all the hassle related to SEO, SMO and Ad campaign while you focus on your product :)

points.title: Best in industry SEO & SMO strategies.
points.subtitle: Get the market to notice your business the right way. We have the best online approach.

points.title: Lead generation at your fingertips.
points.subtitle: We work with the most accurate and reliable data sources to get you the best leads and sales.

points.title: Super optimised Ad campaigns
points.subtitle: The most optimised campaign strategies. We study and look out for every single aspect of the market to get the most benificial targeting group.

name: Game Development
description: With the rise of Internet, comes the rise of Multiplayer Games. Grab the opportunity with ease.

points.title: 2D and 3D development
points.subtitle: The players will get the most immersive gaming experience with beautifully crafted graphics and sound design.

points.title: Customised backend and database
points.subtitle: Scalable and most reliable database management to handle millions of users and hours of gameplay.

points.title: Fast response time with sockets
points.subtitle: Game without network Lags. Our team optimizes the client-server connection to ensure smooth and lag-free gameplay.

points.title: Payment portal integration
points.subtitle: One time payment or Recurring subcription. Multiple payment gateway integrations including razorpay, payU and more.
